# Medical
[color=#a4885c]The Medical department[/color] is responsible for keeping the rest of the crew alive and healthy. 

 Their jobs are the [color=#a4885c]Medical Doctors[/color] and the [color=#a4885c]Chemists[/color] as well as their apprentices, the [color=#a4885c]Medical Interns[/color].

 They take care of the [color=#a4885c]production[/color] and [color=#a4885c]distribution[/color] of [color=#a4885c]medicine[/color] and [color=#a4885c]chemicals[/color], as well as the handling of [color=#a4885c]wounded[/color] (or worse) patients.
